name: Lost In The Shadows
description:
Become the hero who will be the first to defeat the toughest enemies of the dungeon.
Develop your character to become indestructible.
You can gain levels, distribute points and upgrade your abilities.

Simple turn-based combat
In the game, the fight is based on the action you want to perform during the turn.
You can attack, increase defense or restore stats.

Infinite character upgrades
You can infinitely improve your character by leveling up. Upgrading skills and stat bonuses.

Easy to understand mechanics
The mechanics in the game are easy to understand, so you don't have to struggle with finding solutions.
